Nomad’s Tracking Card (now known as the Tracking Card Air) has been a staple in my everyday carry for years and something I never leave the house without. However, the brand debuted a new Pro model this year with a metal build and much longer battery life and I have now had a chance to put this thing to the test, so let’s take a look to see if it is worth the higher price tag?

items.title: Super Mario Galaxy + Super Mario Galaxy 2 $59, Hades II, Hollow Knight Silksong, more
items.summary:

But we wanted to touch down this morning to highlight Woot’s deal on the new Super Mario Galaxy + Super Mario Galaxy 2 for Switch. This regularly $70 bundle is relatively rarely on sale outside of these Woot offers and it has now dropped a touch lower at $58.99 Prime shipped. This is the proper U.S. boxed edition at the lowest price we can find – it is currently down at $59.49 shipped via a third-party Walmart if you would prefer to take that route. There is only a Switch version, but there is also a FREE Switch 2 update you can download that “leverages the Nintendo Switch 2’s processing capabilities for an even better adventure.”
